info.title: MyInfo API

get.description:
Retrieves a sample Person data from MyInfo based on UIN/FIN. This API does not require authorisation token.

**Note:** Null value indicates that an attribute is unavailable.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description:
Comma separated list of attributes requested.

Possible attributes are listed in the Person object definition below.

200.description:
OK.

**Note:**
- Response will be a JSON object.

get.description:
This API triggers SingPass login and obtain consent for the user to retrieve user's data from MyInfo.
Once the user has authenticated and consented, an authorisation code (authcode) will be returned together with the state for verification via the callback URL defined.
The authcode can then be used to retrieve an access token via the Token API.

**Note:** This API is public and should be implemented as a link or button on your online webpage.

parameters.name: authmode
parameters.description: Mode of authentication used to obtain user consent. Default is "SINGPASS".

parameters.name: purpose
parameters.description: State the purpose for requesting the data. This will be shown to the user for his consent.

parameters.name: response_type
parameters.description: Response type for authorisation code flow - must be "code".

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma separated list of attributes requested. Possible attributes are listed in the scopes of the OAuth2 Security Schema above.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Identifier to reconcile query and response. This will be sent back to you via the callback URL. Use a unique system generated number for each and every call.

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: Your callback URL for MyInfo to return with the authorisation code.

302.description:
Service will redirect all responses to 'redirect_uri' with additional parameters added as response results. Expected parameters include:
- **code**: this is the authorisation code you will use when calling the token endpoint
- **state**: this should be the same state passed in your initial URL.
- **error**: if there are any errors encountered, the error code will be given in this parameter. If user did not give consent, error value will be 'access_denied', and refer to error_description parameter for the reason.
  - **'404'** - User not found or not registered with MyInfo.
  - **'428'** - Profile Incomplete. User registered for MyInfo less than 1 working day.
  - **'500'** - Unknown or other server side errors.
  - **'503'** - MyInfo under maintenance. Error description will also be given in error_description parameter.
- **error_description**: if error is 'access_denied' i.e. user did not give consent, the description will be 'Resource Owner did not authorize the request'.


**Note:** If user closes the browser window prematurely, there will be no callback to the 'redirect_uri'. Therefore it is important for you to check the 'state' to verify that the transaction is the same.

post.description: This API generates an access token when presented with a valid authcode obtained from the Authorise API. This token can then be used to request for the user's data that were consented.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
Add authorization token constructed containing the RSA digital signature of the base string. Refer to https://www.ndi-api.gov.sg/library/trusted-data/myinfo/tutorial3 on how this token should be generated.

**Note:** This header is not required when calling Sandbox API.

200.description: OK. returning a JSON object which contains the authorisation access token (JWT) that will be used to retrieve the data from MyInfo.

400.description: AuthCode error - missing, invalid, expired, revoked

401.description:
Possible scenarios:
  - No security header given
  - Invalid App ID used. Digital service is not registered with MyInfo
  - The timestamp of server is not synchronised. Check timestamp of server
  - The value of the nonce in the authorisation header was deemed to be repeated. Check that the nonce is not re-used
  - Ensure Apex header to be 'apex_l2_eg' and not 'apex', resulting in 'No security header' error message

404.description:
Possible scenarios:
  - Wrong Token API URL used. Refer to tutorial for the correct Token API URL(staging/production)
  - Same authcode in the body is being used. We do not allow same authcode being used in multiple calls. Ensure that authcode is not repeated.

500.description:
Unexpected error. Error message will be in the response body.

Possible scenarios:
  - Error message: Signature length incorrect. Issue is due to error in digital signature. - Verify your signature by using our signature verifier tool. - Ensure correct key is used to sign the base string.
  - Ensure there is a slash (/) after UINFIN in the request URL. E.g. `https://myinfosg.api.gov.sg/v2/person/S9812381D/`
  - Attributes should be ordered in lexicographical byte value
  - Ensure API URL in the base string include '.e' - `https://myinfosg.e.api.gov.sg`
  - Ensure attributes in base string are separate by comma(,), and not %2C
  - Signature generated is incorrect. Ensure the correct private key used to produce the signature, and base string is UTF-8 encoded.
  - Ensure UIN/FIN is specified in the Person API URL. E.g. `https://myinfosg.e.api.gov.sg/v2/person/`
  - Ensure the base string contains the following:
      1. HTTP GET method(in uppcase)
      2. API (e.g. https://..)
      3. These 6 APEX parameters:
        * apex_l2_eg_app_id
        * apex_l2_eg_nonce
        * apex_l2_eg_signature
        * apex_l2_eg_signature_method
        * apex_l2_eg_timestamp
        * apex_l2_eg_version

get.description:
This API returns user's data from MyInfo when presented with a valid access token obtained from the Token API.

**Note:** Null value indicates that an attribute is unavailable.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
Add authorization token constructed containing the RSA digital signature of the base string. Refer to https://www.ndi-api.gov.sg/library/trusted-data/myinfo/tutorial3 on how this token should be generated. Also include the access token (JWT) from /token API in your header prefixed with 'Bearer'.

**Note:** Only the Bearer token is required when calling Sandbox API.

parameters.name: txnNo
parameters.description: Transaction ID from requesting digital services for cross referencing.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma separated list of attributes requested. Possible attributes are listed in the scopes of the OAuth2 Security Schema above.

200.description:
OK.

**Note:**
- Response Content-Encoding will be 'gzip'.
- Response Content-Type will be 'application/jose', which is a JSON object conforming to the JWE standard (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7516).
- Your application should decrypt the signature with your application's private key.
- After decrypting the signature, your application will be able to extract the payload in JSON format.

401.description:
Unauthorized. This could be due to the scenarios below:
  - No security header given
  - Invalid App ID used. Digital service is not registered with MyInfo
  - The timestamp of server is not synchronised. Check timestamp of server
  - The value of the nonce in the authorisation header was deemed to be repeated. Check that the nonce is not re-used
  - Ensure Apex header to be 'apex_l2_eg' and not 'apex', resulting in 'No security header' error message
  - The requested UIN/FIN does not match the UIN/FIN of the person who logged in
  - Request contains attributes not allowable for the digital service.

Details will be given in the error object returned.

403.description:
Possible scenarios:

  - Forbidden. Digital service is not registered with MyInfo.
  - Requested attributes does not match the attributes consented by person.
    This happens if the list of attributes in your request are different from the attributes specified when calling the token API.

404.description:
Not Found. UIN/FIN does not exist in MyInfo.

**MESSAGE:** 'UIN/FIN is invalid.'

Possible scenarios:
  - Wrong Person API URL used. Refer to tutorial for the correct Person API URL(staging/production)
  - UIN/FIN has a SingPass account, but does not have a MyInfo profile

500.description:
Error with request parameters or headers. Error details will be provided in the response body.
Possible scenarios:
  - Error message: Signature length incorrect. Issue is due to error in digital signature. - Verify your signature by using our signature verifier tool. - Ensure correct key is used to sign the base string.
  - Ensure there is a slash (/) after UINFIN in the request URL. E.g. `https://myinfosg.api.gov.sg/v2/person/S9812381D/`
  - Attributes should be ordered in lexicographical byte value
  - Ensure API URL in the base string include '.e' - `https://myinfosg.e.api.gov.sg`
  - Ensure attributes in base string are separate by comma(,), and not %2C
  - Signature generated is incorrect. Ensure the correct private key used to produce the signature, and base string is UTF-8 encoded.
  - Ensure UIN/FIN is specified in the Person API URL. E.g. `https://myinfosg.e.api.gov.sg/v2/person/`
  - Ensure the base string contains the following:
      1. HTTP GET method(in uppcase)
      2. API (e.g. https://..)
      3. These 6 APEX parameters:
        * apex_l2_eg_app_id
        * apex_l2_eg_nonce
        * apex_l2_eg_signature
        * apex_l2_eg_signature_method
        * apex_l2_eg_timestamp
        * apex_l2_eg_version

code.description: The authcode given by the authorise API.

client_secret.description: Secret key given to your application during onboarding.

redirect_uri.description: Your callback URL for MyInfo to validate.

oauth2.description: The following are the available OAuth2 scopes for MyInfo APIs

scopes.name: Full Name
scopes.hanyupinyinaliasname: Han Yu Pin Yin Alias name
scopes.marriagecertno: Certificate number of the latest marriage
scopes.workpassstatus: Work pass status of a FIN holder
scopes.workpassexpirydate: Work pass expiry of a foreigner

id_token.description:
Id token of the person who logged in. This is in the form of  JWT (JSON web token).

**Note:** This is not used.

JWTAccessToken.title: JWTAccessToken
JWTAccessToken.description:
Access token to be used in the subsequent 'person' endpoint call. This is in the form of  JWT (JSON web token). Include this in your header as 'Bearer' when invoking the 'person' API. This JWT complies to the standard 'JSON Web Token (JWT) Profile for OAuth 2.0 Client Authentication and Authorization Grants' (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7523).

**Note:** This token is returned in the form of a compact serialized string. Decode and verify the signature before use.

tokenName.description: Name of Token. This will be 'access_token'.

sub.description: (subject) This is the 'uinfin' of the user who logged in.

scope.description: Scopes allowed. This is the list attributes user consented to share.

nbf.description: (not before) - the time before which the token MUST NOT be accepted for processing

expires_in.description: The remaining lifetime of the access token.

iat.description: (issued at) Time which JWT was issued at.

exp.description: (expiration time) time which JWT will expire

jti.description: (JWT ID) unique identifier for the JWT token.

authGrantId.description: Internal system id for auth grant. Not used.

auditTrackingId.description: Internal Id for audit tracking. not used.

value.description: value of the field, should be displayed as it is.

hanyupinyinname.title: HanYuPinYin
hanyupinyinname.description:
Han Yu Pin Yin name of the Person.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `hanyupinyinname` (i.e. not empty), then `hanyupinyinname` should be displayed in a new line below `name`, and formatted with round brackets i.e. "(`hanyupinyinname`)"'*

aliasname.title: Alias
aliasname.description:
Alias name of the Person.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `aliasname` (i.e. not empty), then `aliasname` should be displayed in a new line below `hanyupinyinname`, and prefixed with the ''@'' symbol i.e. "@`aliasname`".'*

hanyupinyinaliasname.title: HanYuPinYinAlias
hanyupinyinaliasname.description:
Han Yu Pin Yin Alias name of the Person.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `hanyupinyinaliasname` (i.e. not empty), then `hanyupinyinaliasname` should be displayed in a new line below `aliasname`, and prefixed with the ''@'' symbol i.e. "@`hanyupinyinaliasname`".*

marriedname.title: MarriedName
marriedname.description:
Married name of the Person.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `marriedname` (i.e. not empty), then `marriedname` should be displayed in a new line below `hanyupinyinaliasname`.*

value.description: value of the field, should be displayed as it is.

sex.title: Sex
sex.description:
Sex of Person.
* 'F' - Female
* 'M' - Male
* 'U' - Unknown

race.title: Race
race.description:
Race of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

secondaryrace.title: SecondaryRace
secondaryrace.description:
Secondary Race of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

dialect.title: Dialect
dialect.description:
Dialect of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

nationality.title: Nationality
nationality.description:
Nationality of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

value.description: Value of data field. See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

birthcountry.title: BirthCountry
birthcountry.description:
Country of Birth of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

residentialstatus.title: ResidentialStatus
residentialstatus.description:
Residential Status of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

passportnumber.title: PassportNumber
passportnumber.description:
Passport Number of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

passportexpirydate.title: PassportExpiryDate
passportexpirydate.description:
Passport Expiry Date of Person.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

code.description: Value of data field. See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

housingtype.title: HousingType
housingtype.description:
Housing Type of Person (non-HDB only).

**Note:** This value will be null if housing type is HDB;

Refer to `hdbtype` for detailed HDB type.

* '121' - DETACHED HOUSE
* '122' - SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE
* '123' - TERRACE HOUSE
* '131' - CONDOMINIUM
* '132' - EXECUTIVE CONDOMINIUM
* '139' - APARTMENT

hdbtype.title: HDBType
hdbtype.description:
HDB Type of Person (HDB only).

**Note:** This value will be null if housing type is not HDB.

* '111' - 1-ROOM FLAT (HDB)
* '112' - 2-ROOM FLAT (HDB)
* '113' - 3-ROOM FLAT (HDB)
* '114' - 4-ROOM FLAT (HDB)
* '115' - 5-ROOM FLAT (HDB)
* '116' - EXECUTIVE FLAT (HDB)
* '118' - STUDIO APARTMENT (HDB)

ownerprivate.title: OwnerPrivate
ownerprivate.description:
Ownership of Private Property Status of Person (based on IRAS information).

* true
* false
* null (data not available)

marital.title: Marital
marital.description:
Marital Status of Person.

* '1' - SINGLE
* '2' - MARRIED
* '3' - WIDOWED
* '5' - DIVORCED

**Note:** This field must be made **editable** on your digital service form even though `source` is '1' (Government Verified).

marriagecertno.title: MarriageCertNo
marriagecertno.description:
Certificate number of the latest marriage.


**Note:** This field must be made **editable** on your digital service form even though `source` is '1' (Government Verified).

countryofmarriage.title: CountryOfMarriage
countryofmarriage.description:
Country of the latest marriage.


**Note:** This field must be made **editable** on your digital service form even though `source` is '1' (Government Verified).

marriagedate.title: MarriageDate
marriagedate.description:
Latest Marriage Date of Person.


**Note:** This field must be made **editable** on your digital service form even though `source` is '1' (Government Verified).

value.description:
Value of data field.

See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

divorcedate.title: DivorceDate
divorcedate.description:
Last Divorce Date of Person.


**Note:** This field must be made **editable** on your digital service form even though `source` is '1' (Government Verified).

value.description:
Value of data field.

See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

childrenbirthrecords.title: ChildrenBirthRecords
childrenbirthrecords.description:
This refers to only local registered birth records(based on ICAs electronic Birth Certificate Records from 1985 onwards).

This includes adoption of locally registered child.

For child below 21, the childs Birth Cert No, Name, Sex, Race, Dialect, Date of Birth and Time of Birth will be shown.

For child above 21, only the childs Birth Cert Number will be shown.

edulevel.title: EduLevel
edulevel.description:
Highest Education Level of Person.

* '0' - NO FORMAL QUALIFICATION / PRE-PRIMARY / LOWER PRIMARY
* '1' - PRIMARY
* '2' - LOWER SECONDARY
* '3' - SECONDARY
* '4' - POST-SECONDARY (NON-TERTIARY): GENERAL & VOCATION
* '5' - POLYTECHNIC DIPLOMA
* '6' - PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATION AND OTHER DIPLOMA
* '7' - BACHELOR'S OR EQUIVALENT
* '8' - POSTGRADUATE DIPLOMA / CERTIFICATE (EXCLUDING MASTER'S AND DOCTORATE)
* '9' - MASTER'S AND DOCTORATE OR EQUIVALENT
* 'N' - MODULAR CERTIFICATION (NON-AWARD COURSES / NON-FULL QUALIFICATIONS)

gradyear.title: GradYear
gradyear.description: Year of Graduation of Person. Format: YYYY

type.description:
Code value of school name.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible school names.

**Note:** Code and desc are mutually exclusive.

desc.description:
Free text value of school name.
**Note:** Code and desc are mutually exclusive.

value.description:
Code value of occupation based on SSOC 2015.

For full list, refer to SSOC 2015 at https://www.singstat.gov.sg/standards/standards-and-classifications/ssoc.

For FIN holders, blank will be returned.

**Note:** Value and desc are mutually exclusive.

desc.description:
Free text value of occupation.

**Note:** Value and desc are mutually exclusive.

workpassstatus.title: WorkPassStatus
workpassstatus.description:
Work pass status of a FIN holder.
**Note:** Only applies to a foreigner with a valid work pass. * Live * Approved

workpassexpirydate.title: WorkPassExpiryDate
workpassexpirydate.description:
Work pass expiry of a foreigner.
**Note:** Only applies to a foreigner with a valid work pass.

value.description: Value of data field. See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

householdincome.title: HouseholdIncome
householdincome.description: Household Income of Person in SGD.

high.description: upper bound of the range of household income bracket

low.description: lower bound of the range of household income bracket

assessableincome.title: AssessableIncome
assessableincome.description: Latest Assessable Income of Person in SGD.

assessyear.title: AssessYear
assessyear.description: Year of Assessment (for Assessable Income). Format: YYYY

cpfcontributions.title: CPFContributions
cpfcontributions.description: Employer CPF Contributions of Person in SGD. Does not include any non-employer contributions. Maximum past 14 months' of contributions.

cpfbalances.title: CPFBalances
cpfbalances.description: CPF Balances of Person in SGD.

classification.description: Data classification of data field. Default 'C' - Confidential.

source.description:
Source of data.

* '1' - Government-verified
* '2' - User provided
* '3' - Field is Not Applicable to Person
* '4' - Verified by SingPass

**Note:** All Government-verified fields must be **non-editable** on your digital service form (some exceptions apply - see individual field descriptions).

lastupdated.description: Last updated date of data field. See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

country.description: Country of Address. For AddressLocal this will always be "SG".

date.description: Date of Contribution Paid. See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/htm

month.description: Month for which CPF Contribution was paid. Format: YYYY-MM

type.description:
Type of Relationship.
* REL101 - HUSBAND
* REL102 - WIFE
* REL201 - MOTHER
* REL202 - FATHER
* REL401 - SON
* REL402 - DAUGHTER
* REL601 - BROTHER
* REL602 - SISTER

idno.description:
ID Number (NRIC/FIN) of family member.
**Note:** 'idno' and 'passportno' are mutually exclusive.

passportno.description:
Passport Number of family member.
**Note:** 'idno' and 'passportno' are mutually exclusive.

hanyupinyinname.description:
Han Yu Pin Yin name of child.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `hanyupinyinname` (i.e. not empty), then `hanyupinyinname` should be displayed in a new line below `name`, and formatted with round brackets i.e. \"(`hanyupinyinname`)\".*

aliasname.description:
Alias name of child.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `aliasname` (i.e. not empty), then `aliasname` should be displayed in a new line below `hanyupinyinname`, and prefixed with the ''@'' symbol i.e. \"@`aliasname`\".*

hanyupinyinaliasname.description:
Han Yu Pin Yin Alias name of child.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `hanyupinyinaliasname` (i.e. not empty), then `hanyupinyinaliasname` should be displayed in a new line below `aliasname`, and prefixed with the ''@'' symbol i.e. \"@`hanyupinyinaliasname`\".*

marriedname.title: MarriedName
marriedname.description:
Married name of child.

*Presentation Logic - If there is a value to `marriedname` (i.e. not empty), then `marriedname` should be displayed in a new line below `hanyupinyinaliasname`.*

sex.description:
Sex of child.
* F - Female
* M - Male
* U - Unknown

race.description:
Race of child.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

secondaryrace.description:
Secondary Race of child.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

dialect.description:
Dialect of child.

Refer to the [Code reference tables](#section/Support) for list of possible values.

dob.description:
Date of Birth of child.

See "full-date" in http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

tob.description:
Time of Birth of child.

Format: HHMM

prefix.description: Prefix of Phone Number. Defaults to '+'. If phone number is blank, prefix will be returned as blank.

code.description: Area Code of Phone Number. Default to '065'. If phone number is blank, code will be returned as blank.
